name: Kebab Stand
description:
Grill up kebabs in this three-day challenge!

Customers will get mad and leave if you do not serve them quick enough. Click or tap them to open up the preparation screen. Make sure you put the chicken on the kebab skewer!

This game was made in a couple of days for Ludum Dare 45 and was my first ever solo game jam. I wanted to make a game like the flash games that I used to play as a kid. It was a big challenge making this in such a short time frame! I learned that things always take longer then I expected them to :-)
